subject: Soccer
organizations: New York City Football Club (Soccer Team)
lead_paragraph: Thomas McNamara, David Villa and Kwadwo Poku scored second-half goals, and New York City F.C. beat visiting D.C. United, 3-1, in their first matchup.
snippet: Thomas McNamara, David Villa and Kwadwo Poku scored second-half goals, and New York City F.C. beat visiting D.C. United, 3-1, in their first matchup.
